text: CSKA Moscow was a Russian bandy club which was a department of CSKA Moscow. It won the Soviet national championship in 1954, 1955 and 1957. The bandy department was established in 1936 and disbanded in 1962. ==Honours== ===Domestic=== * Soviet Champions: ** Winners (3): 1954, 1955, 1957 ** Runners-up (4): 1956, 1958, 1960, 1962 * Soviet Cup: ** Winners (3): 1939, 1945, 1946 Category:Bandy clubs in the Soviet Union Category:Bandy clubs established in 1936 Category:Bandy clubs disestablished in 1962 Category:Defunct bandy clubs Category:1936 establishments in Russia Category:1962 disestablishments in Russia Category:CSKA Moscow
title: CSKA Moscow (bandy club)
